The game is great. I love it. I been cs fan for a long time. But the thing is the anti-cheat sucks. You will be playing against a lot of cheaters and some times you wont even know it. Cheat like wallhacks mostly gets banned only by overwatch. The game needs a better anti-cheat. I recommend playing on faceit if you get frustrated because of cheaters.
